CustomField.description: This was created to be used as a unique identifier for updating the features to Salesforce. This is used by the flows that sync to and from Zentitle. The format is the Zentitle ID + - + Software Feature ID. IE: "a578C000000H9e2QAC-atr_8dhDJyCfOU6NrcH2mTei3g"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Software Entitlement ID appended with the Software Feature ID
CustomField.label: Software Feature External ID
